alert.note: Alert for Butler; Lawrence; Venango (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 25 at 3:31PM EDT until March 25 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM EDT FOR WESTERN VENANGO...NORTHEASTERN LAWRENCE AND NORTHWESTERN BUTLER COUNTIES... At 331 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Riceville, or 15 miles east of Meadville, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Sugarcreek, Harrisville, Polk, Cooperstown, Barkeyville, and Utica. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
